page.title: 12Leisure
page.content:
These are some of the main leisure activities in order of popularity.
ADULTS CHILDREN
Gardening Sport Reading Cycling Sport Swimming Horse riding
We omitted television from the list because it is so much a part of daily life that no child listed it as a leisure activity.On further investigation 95% of the children said they watched T.V. every day.Sport for adults was mostly watching;for children mostly participating.Swimming takes place chiefly at the two local indoor pools at Leominster and Tenbury.
